REST API¶

app.cars.api.cars_create()[source]¶

Create a car record

Parameters

  • make (string) – car brand

  • color (string) – car color

  • body_type (string) – car body type

  • seats (int) – number of seats

  • cost_per_hour (int) – cost per hour

Returns

Car in JSON format
